name: The Mansion - Puzzle Mystery Game
description:
The Mansion is a puzzle mystery game. A woman named Ada Baker, wife of a wealthy businessman is found dead in their house. You, with the help of Inspector Lt. Ambrose, are to solve the mystery of the murder.

There are a bunch of items scattered in the mansion and you have to find and investigate them.

There are many fun and simple puzzles throughout the game along with a rich story.
